content.description:
In the Montérégie you'll find a couple hills with plenty of potential, Though most are now off limits... 
 The is bordered on the north by the Outaouais river and the Saint-Lawrence, on the west by Ontario, the south by the United States and to the east around riviere Saint-Francois. 
  
 ST-HILAIRE CLIFF 
 Mont-Saint-Hilaire was closed to climbing in the mid 90's following a dispute with a local guiding company. 
 The Gault Nature Preserve has decreased its access since this period, access to XC Skiing is being stopped for the 18-19 season. 
 Any un-authorized access will further limit our ability to climb there again.
